system.description: This is a small, circular shield measuring about one foot in diameter. It is securely strapped to the wielder’s arm rather than being handheld. A sturdy spike protrudes from the center of the shield, allowing it to double as a weapon. Its robust construction ensures that it is resistant to breakage during combat.
